item.title: VMC
item.description: Development version (the whole repository): git clone http://github.com/vmc-project/vmc.git The pro version is under construction. To switch to pro tagged version 1.0: ```bash cd vmc git checkout v1-0 ``` --

item.title: Geant3
item.description: Development version (the whole repository): git clone http://github.com/vmc-project/geant3.git To switch to pro tagged version 2.7: cd geant3 git checkout v2-7 To switch to old tagged version 2.6: (For older versions see the correspondent tag and the required version of ROOT in the table): cd geant3 git checkout v2-6

item.title: Geant4 VMC
item.description: Development version (the whole repository): git clone http://github.com/vmc-project/geant4_vmc.git To switch to tagged tagged version 4.0.p1: git checkout v4-0-p1 To switch to old tagged version 3.6.p3 (compatible with Geant4 10.04.x): cd geant4_vmc git checkout v3-6-p3 The list of new developments, bug fixes and the required versions of ROOT and Geant4 for each version can be found in the history file. Download Geant4 - from the Geant4 Web site Download fluka_vmc: The access to the fluka_vmc SVN repository is restricted.
